title: Do It Again
lyrics: Everyday I try to escape the realities of this world (world)
So I tell a disc jockey "press play" while I press up on a girl (girl)
In the midst of the smoke in the air
The reflection of lights that glare
She'll be out of control like a hydroplane
In plain sight I might have to stare (shush)
And that's power steering (uh)
A power trip will see my appearance (uh)
Pile of hundreds (uh) all on a prowl
Like vampires in the darkest dungeon (uh)
Speakers bumpin', drinks is pouring
We in the house, we paid the mortgage, tyrannosaurus
That's real big, pop my collar, pop that lid (uh)
Flashin' lights, model types, vixen show me much love
Put the bottles on that ice, drink like we supposed to
Fire burning, heads is turning, all I see is energy
So eventually
We'll do this 'til the- (sun come up, the sun)
We'll do this 'til the- (sun come up, the sun)
Smoke like this 'til the- (sun come up, the sun)
We'll do this 'til the moon is dropping day break watching
Then do it again
Some people stay home and sleep, me I go out at night (night)
All seven days of the week, I live the party life (life)
I got my dogs with me (with me)
You can bring some of your friends
We going hard 'til the sun come up and do it again
I got a drink in my hand
They playing my favorite song (favorite song)
This girl that's dancing on me (on me)
Ain't got no panties on (panties on)
And she gonna come back to my hotel, don't tell
Anyone about us, I'm here to party all night
Flashin' lights, model types, vixen show me much love
Put the bottles on that ice, drink like we supposed to
Fire burning, heads is turning, all I see is energy
So eventually
We'll do this 'til the- (sun come up, the sun)
We'll do this 'til the- (sun come up, the sun)
Smoke like this 'til the- (sun come up, the sun)
We'll do this 'til the moon is dropping day break watching
Then do it again
Come to my section (my section)
And down some of this liquor (liquor)
Then tell me what it hit for (hit for)
Gon' be some things I don't remember (remember)
So take some camera phone pictures
Come to my section (my section)
And down some of this liquor (liquor)
Then tell me what it hit for (hit for)
Gon' be some things I don't remember (remember)
So take some camera phone pictures
Flashin' lights, model types, vixen show me much love
Put the bottles on that ice, drink like we supposed to
Fire burning, heads is turning, all I see is energy
So eventually
We'll do this 'til the- (sun come up, the sun)
We'll do this 'til the- (sun come up, the sun)
Smoke like this 'til the- (sun come up, the sun)
We'll do this 'til the moon is dropping day break watching
Then do it again
